name: Coin Pusher Night
description:
Coin pusher machine game -- Insert coins and push them out with pusher.

Insert coins with good timing from the icon at the bottom of the screen, and push out the coins to get them. If you put a coin into Checker, the moving square part, the slot will rotate and you can get a coin.  You can get much more coins when all the numbers match, especially in the case those are "777"!
